body_html: Why is it be interesting to use the output of a run as the input of the next run? By the different runs do you mean two different batches? Do you mean two series within a batch? What if the zero_state was just random noise?
body_text: Why is it be interesting to use the output of a run as the input of the next run? By the different runs do you mean two different batches? Do you mean two series within a batch? What if the zero_state was just random noise?
body: Why is it be interesting to use the output of a run as the input of the next run? By the different runs do you mean two different batches? Do you mean two series within a batch? What if the zero_state was just random noise?
